attributes.action: reintroduce the indexation of state pensions with wages, rather than prices with immediate effect rather than in 2012.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
25 years ago the Government of the time broke the link between pensions and wages and linked pensions to prices.
Since that time the value of the state pension when compared with wages has been eroded considerably.
The present Government has stated that it is minded to re-introduce the link in 2012, but this will mean that many pensioners will never benefit from this increase as they may die in the meantime.
In fairness the link must be re-introduced NOW

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/restorepensions/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
